data.title: A Brief History of The 6th Marines
data.meta_description: A Brief History of the 6th Marines - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The document provides background information on the 6th Marines Regiment. It begins with a summary of the regiment's actions in World War I, including key battles at Chateau-Thierry, Belleau Wood, Soissons, St. Mihiel, and the Meuse-Argonne. It then discusses the regiment's activities between the wars, including service in China. Next, it covers the regiment's expedition to Iceland in 1941 to replace British troops. The document continues with summaries of the regiment's involvement in battles in World War II, including the Guadalcanal campaign and the Battle of Tarawa. It provides context and high-level details about the 6th Marines' participation in these major conflicts.
data.text: A Brief History of The 6th Marines
